item.title: 英伟达现在太强大了，中国政府无法制约
item.description: 中国正在对英伟达公司涉嫌违反反垄断法的行为进行调查，这曾是中国政府最害怕的讨价还价手段之一。但首先...【原文：China is investigating Nvidia over suspected antitrust violations, pulling a lever that was once one of Beijing’s most feared bargaining tools. But first...】

item.title: 2025 年展望：通胀降低，增长稳定，但存在下行风险
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们来看看彭博经济学对2025年的展望。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the Bloomberg Economics outlook for 2025. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: SBB 向债券持有人发行新票据以缓解诉讼 "噪音
item.description: 瑞典房东 SBB 对其债务结构进行了重大调整，准备下个月在伦敦打一场具有里程碑意义的诉讼官司。【原文：Swedish landlord SBB has launched a major overhaul of its debt structure as it prepares to fight a landmark litigation case in London next month.】

item.title: 中国出口在美国关税忧虑下攀升至接近流行性高点
item.description: 由于对美国关税的担忧升温，中国企业急于完成来自海外的订单，推动出口跃升至两年多来的最高水平，并帮助推动制造业巨头的贸易顺差创下新纪录。【原文：Chinese companies, rushing to fill orders from overseas as concerns about US tariffs heat up, propelled a jump in exports to the highest in more than two years and helped push the manufacturing giant’s trade surplus to a record.】

item.title: 早期用户放弃谷歌搜索，转而使用人工智能聊天机器人
item.description:
人们搜索网络的方式发生重大转变将颠覆互联网经济，对科技界最大的公司之一构成重大挑战。【原文：

A major shift in how people search the web would upend the economy of the internet, posing a major challenge to one of tech’s biggest companies.

】

item.title: 国际清算银行称财政债务狂潮是全球最大的稳定威胁
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）表示，政府的借贷习惯对世界经济稳定构成了最大的威胁，近期市场情绪的变化应该成为一个警示。【原文：Government borrowing habits pose the biggest danger to world economic stability and recent shifts in market sentiment should serve as a warning, the Bank for International Settlements said.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克会面推动匈牙利电信公司 4iG 股价上涨
item.description: 在匈牙利电信公司 4iG Nyrt 的董事长向亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）介绍了公司的计划之后，该公司的股价飙升至两年多来的最高点。【原文：Shares of 4iG Nyrt., a Hungarian telecommunications company, surged to the highest in more than two years after its chairman got to present the company’s plans to billionaire Elon Musk.】

item.title: 英国家庭将面临能源账单的进一步挤压
item.description: 据预测，英国能源价格上限将在 4 月份连续第三次上调，这是政府试图降低家庭和企业账单的最新挫折。【原文：The UK energy price cap is forecast to rise for a third consecutive time in April, the latest setback in the government’s attempt to lower bills for homes and businesses.】

item.title: 华尔街之问：2025 年会出什么问题？
item.description: 随着分析师们告别 2024 年，迎接 2025 年，华尔街开始出现过去和未来圣诞节的幽灵。【原文：The Ghosts of Christmas Past and Future are starting to emerge on Wall Street as analysts say farewell to 2024 and hello to 2025.】

item.title: 安哥拉出售1.5亿美元外汇用于进口，宽扎汇率趋于稳定
item.description: 安哥拉中央银行正在向商业银行出售1.5亿美元的外汇，用于大米进口和其他私人交易。【原文：Angola’s central bank is selling $150 million of foreign currency to commercial banks for rice imports and other private transactions.】

item.title: SSE 计划投资 220 亿英镑加强苏格兰电网建设
item.description: SSE Plc 的输电业务计划投资 220 亿英镑，在苏格兰建设关键的电网基础设施，这是英国实现能源安全目标和在本十年末建成清洁电网的关键所在。【原文：SSE Plc’s transmission business plans £22 billion in investments to deliver critical grid infrastructure in Scotland, key to the UK’s energy security goals and ambition to reach a clean power grid by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 波兰亿万富翁索洛兹在继承权冲突中遭遇挫折
item.description: 波兰亿万富翁齐格蒙特-索洛兹（Zygmunt Solorz）在其媒体、电信和能源帝国的继承权之争中遭受打击，因为列支敦士登法院在 10 月份的一项裁决中支持了他的子女。【原文：Polish billionaire Zygmunt Solorz suffered a blow in a succession fight over his media, telecommunications and energy empire after a Liechtenstein court sided with his children in an October ruling.】

item.title: 增长放缓和关税风险令苹果涨势不减
item.description: 在大型科技股中，苹果公司（Apple Inc.但这些都没有阻碍苹果公司股价的上涨。【原文：Apple Inc. has the slowest revenue growth among Big Tech stocks and is facing tariff-related risks going into Donald Trump’s second term. None of that is holding back the stock.】

item.title: 英镑兑欧元触及 2022 年以来最高点，汇率走势分化
item.description: 英镑兑欧元升至两年半以来的最强水平，这主要是受英国央行降息力度将小于欧洲央行的押注提振。【原文：The pound rose to its strongest level against the euro in over two and a half years, boosted by bets the Bank of England will cut interest rates less aggressively than the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 叙利亚表明中东不能将稳定视为理所当然
item.description: 当国际货币基金组织总裁上个月访问开罗时，她发现自己正盯着一幅巨大的编织挂图，这幅挂图的复杂性可以隐喻她在整个阿拉伯世界的微妙任务。【原文：When the International Monetary Fund chief visited Cairo last month, she found herself staring at Egypt in the form of a huge woven wall map, whose intricacy could be a metaphor for her delicate task across the Arab world.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后美国小型企业乐观情绪飙升至三年新高
item.description: 由于预期唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后会有更有利的经济政策，美国小型企业的乐观情绪在 11 月份飙升至三年多来的最高点。【原文：US small-business optimism surged in November to a more than three-year high in anticipation of more favorable economic policies after Donald Trump sealed his return to the White House.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克斯在拉脱维亚央行职位上面临两位挑战者
item.description: 拉脱维亚中央银行行长马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）在争取连任五年的竞选中将面对另外两名候选人。【原文：Latvian central-bank Governor Martins Kazaks will face two other candidates in his bid to secure another five-year term.】

item.title: 印度即将离任的央行行长留下了永恒的遗产
item.description: 沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）结束了印度央行行长的任期，将缰绳交给了一位职业官僚，许多人称赞他作为一个相对局外人的表现，依靠外交手段将世界上增长最快的主要经济体推向了新的高度。【原文：As Shaktikanta Das finishes up his tenure as India’s central bank governor, handing over the reins to a career bureaucrat, many have praised his performance as a relative outsider who leaned on diplomacy to propel the world’s fastest-growing major economy to new heights.】

item.title: 古根海姆的沃尔什认为私人信贷规模将翻一番
item.description: 古根海姆合伙人投资管理公司首席投资官安妮-沃尔什认为，全球私人信贷市场的规模将翻一番，达到 4 万亿美元。【原文：Chief investment officer of Guggenheim Partners Investment Management Anne Walsh sees the private credit market doubling in size to $4 trillion globally.】

item.title: 壳牌与绿色和平组织就北海登船事件达成和解
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）和绿色和平组织（Greenpeace）就一场法律纠纷达成庭外和解，该纠纷的焦点是气候活动人士登上并占领壳牌在英国北海的一艘近海船只长达 13 天。【原文：Shell Plc and Greenpeace reached an out-of-court settlement over a legal dispute that centered on climate activists boarding and occupying a Shell offshore vessel in the UK North Sea for 13 days.】

item.title: 韩国驻院医生人数在与尹汝尚的分歧中急剧下降
item.description: 韩国的住院医生人数骤降至多年来的最低点，加剧了医生短缺的状况，这使得政府与医生之间产生了矛盾，而尹锡烈总统现已废除的戒严令则使这一状况更加恶化。【原文：South Korea’s intake of resident doctors plunged to the lowest in years, exacerbating a shortage of medical practitioners that’s put the government at odds with doctors and made worse by President Yoon Suk Yeol’s now-aborted martial law.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官布卢姆谈削减成本和中国新战略
item.description: 德国大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）誓言要继续削减成本，因为这家德国汽车制造商正在为中国制定新的发展路线。【原文：Volkswagen AG Chief Executive Officer Oliver Blume vowed to continue cutting costs as the German automaker charts a new course for China, where it is struggling with poor demand and waning relevance.】

item.title: Just Eat 债券持有人集团称 Grubhub 出售是违约事件
item.description: 在在线食品配送平台 Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 最近出售其子公司 Grubhub 之后，该公司的一群债券持有人正联合起来寻求提前还款。【原文：A group of bondholders of Just Eat Takeaway.com NV are banding together to seek early repayment, following the online food delivery platform’s recent sale of its subsidiary Grubhub.】

item.title: 火鸡和土豆价格上涨，英国圣诞大餐成本增加
item.description: 由于火鸡和土豆等主食价格上涨，英国圣诞大餐的成本上涨幅度是两年来最大的。【原文：The cost of a Christmas meal in the UK has risen the most in two years on higher prices for staples like turkey and potatoes.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元基金寻求更多私人信贷创新
item.description: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元的主权投资者呼吁在私人信贷市场推出更多创新产品，包括交易所交易基金，近年来阿布扎比一直在加大对该市场的投资。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s $1 trillion sovereign investor called for more innovative products including exchange-traded funds in the private credit market, where it’s been ramping up bets in recent years.】

item.title: EDP 开始建设英国电池储能项目
item.description: EDP SA 表示，随着葡萄牙公用事业公司在不同市场投资储能，它已开始在英国建设 Harrington Franklin 电池项目。【原文：EDP SA said it started construction of the Harrington Franklin battery project in the UK as the Portuguese utility invests in energy storage across different markets.】

item.title: 对这些企业来说，特朗普的制造业复兴并不靠谱
item.description:
企业表示，他们面临着从环境法规到劳动力短缺等多重生产转移障碍。【原文：

Companies say they confront multiple obstacles to reshoring production, from environmental regulations to labor shortages.

】

item.title: TikTok 商店在西班牙上线，这是欧洲推广的第一步
item.description: TikTok 的应用内购物功能已向西班牙用户上线，这标志着 ByteDance Ltd. 增长最快的业务向欧洲扩张迈出了第一步。【原文：TikTok’s in-app shopping feature has gone live for users in Spain, marking the first step in an expansion of ByteDance Ltd.’s fastest-growing business across Europe.】

item.title: 花旗银行曼特希预计到 2025 年底欧洲股市将上涨近 10
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的策略师表示，投资者过于看空欧洲股市，尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导下的美国贸易关税威胁依然存在，但欧洲股市在 2025 年底可能上涨近 10%。【原文：Investors are too bearish on European equities, which could end 2025 up almost 10%, even as the threat of US trade tariffs under Donald Trump remains, Citigroup Inc. strategists said.】

item.title: 南非商业信心跃升，政府希望增长
item.description: 上个月，南非的商业信心指数飙升至九年来的最高水平，这表明随着南非新执政联盟的鼓励，经济前景将得到显著改善。【原文：South Africa’s business confidence soared to the highest level in nine years last month, suggesting a significant improvement in the economic outlook as businesses take encouragement from the country’s new governing alliance.】
